text:
Uber | Multiple openings | New York City

Process: phone screen, 1 onsite interview, offer.

UberEverything is leading the charge to change Uber from a company that moves people, to a company that moves everything and weâ€™re doing it all from a small engineering office here in New York. Every day we work on engineering problems that range from picking the right car on the right route to building an application for our partners that helps them do complex jobs without being able to actually look at the app. If any of these things sound interesting to you, let us know!

Contact: pburke@uber.com
